ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I spent a lot of time thinking about the past or future, rather than being engaged in activities that mattered to me.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I was basically on ''auto-pilot'' most of the time.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I worked toward my goals even if I didn't feel motivated to.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I was proud about how I lived my life.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I made progress in the areas of my life I care most about.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... Difficult thoughts, feelings or memories got in the way of what I really wanted to do.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I continued to get better at being the kind of person I want to be.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... When things didn't go according to plan, I gave up easily.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... I felt like I had a purpose in life.
Notes: 0= Not at all true; 6= Completely true

ElementDescription: During the past week, including today... It seemed like I was just ''going through the motions'' rather than focusing on what was important to me.
